name: Gem Run
description:
GemRun is a short action game where you control a mine cart with gems and you have to defeat 5 other mine carts by bumping them off the slowly dissolving bridge.

Race to the end and protect your gem!

There are 8 possible AIs controlling the other mine carts, some of them are tougher than others!

The bridge will dissolve almost completely in 5 minutes!

Protect your gem from the dangerous acid!  

Knock your opponents off the bridge!   

Bounce your way to the exit!  

Choose your own colorful gem!  

Tools Used 

Unity 

VSCode 

Paint.net 

Bfxr 

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com

Controls  

Move around with WASD, arrow keys, or joystick  

Jump with Space, Enter, or A  

Restart level with R
